Contributor: Pennsylvania. Council of National Defense, publisher.;
Note: Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says there is a penalty of a $5000 fine and imprisonment for violating the Explosive Regulations law. The law says you must have a license to manufacture, buy or sell blasting supplies. And it is the patriotic duty of every citizen to report any violation of this law. No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Pa. : Pennsylvania Council of National Defense,
